logentry.msg: Fixing bug that occured when removing an user. The problem was that the policy did not got updated that contained the accreditable because we did not updated the key matching

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg:
Fixing test case that created a zombie user, which was not registered with the usermanager but left traces in the admin/user dir of the ac.
Changing it to the default test user fixes the problem.

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Fixing bug related to url rights. Since we did not incremented the position we have overriden always the last credential leading to that only the first role got added to the credentials.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Don't try to load arbitrary resource type CSS, but allow to add html head to the resource type format XML.

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: The ac restricted blocked all modules out, since they did not had a policy file. The usecase-policies.xml is not read by the ac, it only got read for the menu generation.

logentry.msg: add single resource Doc and not all docs in area to the ArrayList for each resource

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg:
This commit extends the lenyadoc protocol with the ability to return the meta data instead of the document. This commit is not a 100% clean solution since it assumes that the meta data are stored in the document URL + ".meta" which may not be true as soon JCR comes in to the game.
You can use now lenyadoc:meta:... (the rest is like before lenyadoc:// or lenyadoc:/) as protocol to get the meta data for the document.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Changed tab JX template to work with Windows / Unix. No idea how to make it work with all OSs ...

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Changed form XSLT inclusion to fallback URI. This makes the form editor work with modules.copy=false.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added workaround to view.xsp: don't use page-envelope:document-path, but build the path using UUID and language. I hope this can be replaced with decent revision control code soon.

logentry.author: andreas

logentry.author: thorsten

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: set the default doctype of the html serializer to 'loose'. this should put browsers into 'almost standards mode' instead of 'quirks mode', which should be better because it's closer to standards and it's supposed to work quite well with most browsers.

logentry.msg: SVG sitemap: match GIFs first because they use a reader instead of generator+serializer

logentry.msg: reverted commit 448513 that attempted to remove incorrect css statements from the lenya menu. alas, his royal crappiness the internet explorer was not amused, and there was no obvious standards-compliant fix.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
rename all usecases to adhere to the form <moduleShortname>.<action>.
this fixes bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=39796.
if you are calling usecases in your custom code, you will have to modify it. to help with the job, the script http://people.apache.org/~nettings/rename-usecases.sh will find all occurrences of old usecase names, which you can then edit manually.

logentry.author: chestnut
logentry.msg: use resource types clean xslt format to clean xml from fckeditor before validation/save *if this is a valid use of a format, webDAV needs to use the format: input module to access the clean-xhtml.xsl stylesheet as well WebDAV module currently incorrectly assumes that the resource type and the module which contain it have the same name

logentry.msg: index exit usecase is no longer needed for editor usecases

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Show login note only for default+blog publication. It's not nice to hard-code this, but since this isn't configured anywhere I guess we can live with it for the moment.

logentry.msg: Improved sitetree icon layout

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Don't try to load icons for non-document sitetree nodes.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
create continuations for usecase uri views (to make them consistent with jxtemplate views)
uri views (i.e. views defined with <view uri="..." .../> in the usecase.xconf) used to be one-shot cocoon.sendPage beasts. no continuation was created for them, as opposed to <view template="..." .../> usecases, for which the usecase framework would call cocoon.sendPageAndWait. this meant that the mechanism of the view fundamentally affected the behaviour of the controller, which is simply wrong in an MVC context.
currently, only three usecases in trunk are affected by this change: * bxe.open * bxe.close * jcrsource.export the bxe stuff works as ever, but iiuc a stale continuation will be created and the usecase will never execute and finish. that is no problem, since the continuation will eventually time out, but it should be fixed at some point. i could not test the behaviour of the jcrsource module.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added failing test case: empty site nodes are not deleted

logentry.author: andreas

logentry.author: andreas

logentry.author: chestnut
logentry.msg: sourceNodeMetaData.getLastModified() should return last modified date of the metadata and not the content

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: changed date format from rfc1123 to iso8601 for standard compliance reasons. if somebody needs rfc1223 format, please use the DateConverterModule.

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: changed format of expires date from rfc1123 to iso8601. use date converter module in sitemap to convert to http specific format

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: added css file for homepage doctype, because the homepage tries to load it.

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: added pipeline and xslt for cocoon profiler. xslt is copied from cocoon

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Fixed wildcard reference inside action context

logentry.author: chestnut
logentry.msg:
Added ability to reference publication from which to fallback from, This should resolves the problem of an xslt template trying to import itself when xslt/page2xhtml.xsl -> imports -> template-fallback://xslt/page2xhtml.xsl -> imports -> template-fallback://xslt/page2xhtml.xsl instead use xslt/page2xhtml.xsl -> imports -> template-fallback://{template1}//xslt/page2xhtml.xsl -> imports -> template-fallback://{template2}//xslt/page2xhtml.xsl
Adding pubids to your fallback:// protocols should also allow one to leave the xslt use-store on if used properly

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: add resource type definitions for "usecasedocument" and "resource" to default pub.

remove dead code (redirect.xsp and redirect.xsl do not exist)
